## interpret glm results

```{r}
glm_model <- glm(
  formula = score ~ time * class + AGE,
  data = df2,
  family = 'gaussian'
)

summary(glm_model)
```

**interpret the results:** 首先是Coefficients, 可以看到，对于这批次数据而言，lme/gee的结果极为类似
